programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Space Rocket - Smartysaurus is going to launch into space in her all-new super space rocket. But as her friends all watch on the Daredale Big Screen, the picture suddenly goes dead! Noddy investigates to find out what happened to Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Smartysaurus'S Jet Pack - Smartysaurus is trying out her new jet pack, but she hasn't read the instructions before taking off and cannot control it properly. Noddy investigates to help her control it before things get too dangerous.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep7
programme.desc: The Case Of The Topsy Turvy Trees - All is set for the Toy Green Picnic until Noddy finds some of the trees turned upside down! Was it the Ninjas climbing on them? Or the Pirates wanting an upside-down tree for Pirate Bay? Noddy launches an investigation to find out who's behind all this.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of The Golden Thing - The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Noisy Story - Topsy wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they interrupt her making lots of noise. Topsy is upset. Raa Raa realises what has happened and goes to make amends.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jingly Jangly Jungle Band - Raa Raa becomes the singer in Crockys Jingly Jangly Jungle Band but he gets so carried away with his singing that he forgets a promise.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep998
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure Playoff - It's a special game show edition of Santiago of the Seas! Santiago, Tomas, and Lorelai have been trapped by Bonnie Bones and her crew. Play along to see if you have what it takes to set them free.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep999
programme.desc: Pirate Play Along Adventure - Santiago, Lorelai, and Tomás want YOU to join their crew! Play along to see if you have what it takes to be a good pirate.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Abra-Ka-Pickle! - Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Toy Trouble! - The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule/Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera, part 1 / Finceañera, part 2 - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Shrunken Ships / The Pirate Parade - When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep23
programme.desc: The Ship's Anchor - We catch up with Captain Sinker on her holiday and see her trying to read a book - a pesky fly soon puts an end to her relaxation!

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S4) Ep24
programme.desc: The Broken Bell - Captain Captain rings her bell and discovers that it's not ringing clearly. Cook and Line love the new sounds of the bell but are ordered by Captain Captain to fix it.

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Drumtums - The Numpups form a band using old pans as drums, but how do they make music which doesn't sound like crashing and banging?!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep31
programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style after hearing a famous bird quartet singing in a nearby tree.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - Duggee has a job to do outside of the Clubhouse. But who will look after the Squirrels? King Tiger of course, he has his Babysitting Badge. But then the Squirrels end up babysitting King Tiger!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Lake Titicaca, South America - What goes up must come down! Grandmaster Glitch lands with a splash in Lake Titicaca in South America.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: The Colosseum, Italy - Glitch visits Rome to race his Grimbots in the Colosseum. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Bubbles - Kit and Pup are blowing bubbles, but whilst Pup is able to blow lots of bubbles, Kit's impatience means she gets frustrated when she can't.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Bed - Dee encourages a friend to say bed and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep118
programme.desc: Go Outside - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po want to go outside but it's raining. Some wellies and umbrellas magically appear and the Teletubbies go outside for splashy, rainy fun.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Mother of Invention - Major Clanger makes a new garden trolley for Mother, and when she accidentally wheels it over his foot, it turns out to be more useful than he could ever have imagined!

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The Thing That Was in the Way - Bob is making words bounce together to celebrate the things he loves.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep58
programme.desc: Finn Fun - How can Logi-Po join in and play with his pet friend Finn the fish in just the same way that Tinpo plays with his hamster Herman?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep59
programme.desc: Tunnel Vision - When an erupting geyser disturbs the rabbits, the team helps them to find a more peaceful home.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep59
programme.desc: Camping - Monty tries to pack too many items for a camping trip, but he learns that sometimes less is more after he and Jimmy Jones work together.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep60
programme.desc: Caring Sharing Monty - Monty is upset when a friend doesn't return his toy, and decides that he won't lend anything again. He soon realises that this isn't always helpful.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Music Power - Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: I Am Inventing A Usefullish Invention - Charlie and Marv have to come up with an invention for a school project by tomorrow. Will Lola's ideas be welcomed by the pair?

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: Windmill Girl - When the wind blows fast Nora has to go fast, but when the wind blows slow, Nora has great fun speeding up and slowing down with the wind.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Sand Monsters - Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep23
programme.desc: Arcade Dance Off - Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: Mars As Moon - Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep4
programme.desc: Percy's New Friends - Percy wants to make friends with the animals on Sodor, but they are frightened of him and run away. Percy realises that if he is gentle and quiet rather than fast and loud, he will stop scaring them.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Dog Loves Night - The lights in the shop go out and Dog and Pug share an adventure seeing all the nocturnal activities around them - bats, cats and foxes. Finally they see the night workers who are repairing the problem.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics. They eagerly want to know the ending, but the comic was discontinued. Luckily Duggee has the comic badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep35
programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell. But what is a sense? Time for the Squirrels to learn about the five senses and earn their Senses Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep36
programme.desc: The Diplomacy Badge - Betty and Sargent Ant just want perfection, but no one seems to be listening to their shouting! They need a lesson in diplomacy to learn how to speak in a more sensitive way.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: The Taj Mahal, India - The grimbots attach a bit of the Taj Mahal to GrimHQ. It remains to be seen whether the Go Jetters can fix the glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Mount Etna, Italy - When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Table Mountain, South Africa - Glitch wants to ski, so the Grimbots give Table Mountain a snowy peak, which threatens its rare plants.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: Pearlina's Thai Catfish & Sticky Rice - Pearlina is cooking catfish and makes a delicious dressing to brush all over it. Pearlina's friends love her Thai themed table.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Andy and the Marmosets - Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to Brazil to take photos of a family of marmosets.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Parker Gets Rich / Ultimate Fighting Cloud - After winning a raffle, Parker comes into a large sum of money, which Angus warns will come at a cost. // The Middlemost Post discover a secret backyard wrestling league that challenges both their skills and egos.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Parker Gets the Bird / Anchor Shackleton - Parker tends to a small strawberry garden until its survival is threatened by a horde of ravenous birds. // Parker discovers Angus can't swim, but with the little nimbus' help, the sailor's on his way to becoming a buoy.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Two of Clubs / Vacation Daze - Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep134
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Last Stand - SpongeBob and Patrick protest the construction of a highway that would destroy Jellyfish Fields.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep135
programme.desc: Back to the Past / The Bad Guy Club for Villains - SpongeBob and Patrick go back in time to see the young Mermaidman and Barnacleboy. // SpongeBob and Patrick watch their heroes fight bad guys in a classic Mermaidman and Barnacleboy episode.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep201
programme.desc: Bulletin Board - SpongeBob erects a community bulletin board in the Krusty Krab, but anonymous reviews posted on it lead to trouble.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Sushi Sitter / Cheer Beast - Captain Man must save Kid Danger from Drillfinger with the only tool he has: a motorized toilet. // Prepping for cheer tryouts, Piper tries out Captain Man's now-discontinued health program but when she turns into a beast the heroes must stop her.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Last Laugh / Driver's Dread - Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act. // Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni ooks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep195
programme.desc: SpongeBob LongPants / Larry’s Gym - SpongeBob gets a pair of long pants, but they change his life in unexpected ways. // When Larry the Lobster opens a new gym in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob becomes his best customer.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep114
programme.desc: Dear Vikings / Ditchin' - There's a new Viking-themed promotion at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob is determined to find out everything there is to know about Vikings. // Mermaidman and Barnacleboy are having a book signing, but SpongeBob can't go because he has boating school.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Get the Hump / Sing For Your Supper - It's Best to the rescue when Bester's phobia of camels threatens to de-rail her chances of being dance champ. // Best and Bester go busking, but will Best cope with competition and what happens when burgers and banjos collide?

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Summer Santa / Closed for Cocooning - When Santa shows up for summer vacation, Angus is conveniently injured and needs Santa to deliver the mail. // Parker wants to help Lily's sisters plan her "Wing Ding," but it's clear the little nimbus doesn't quite fit in.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten - Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Ergets - Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Two of Clubs / Vacation Daze - Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Snooze Pods / Sticky Vicky - Jasper becomes trapped in a dream using one of Schwoz's Snooze Pods. It's up to Captain Man & Kid Danger to bring him back. // Henry's field trip to the Museum of Celebrity Garbage is cut short by the arrival of Sticky Vicky.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Mad Wax / Fails - While being honored at the Celebrity Wax Museum, Captain Man & Kid Danger are attacked by angry wax figures. // Invisible Brad returns & this time he's posting embarrassing videos of Captain Man & Kid Danger until they turn him visible again.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Tour Bus / Game Show - When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead. // Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Alvin Management / Time Capsule - When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger. // When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Trick or Squeak / Mayors for a Day - On a spooky Horse-O-Ween night, Corn and Peg befriend a bat and pledge to give it the best home ever! // After being elected 'Mayors for the Day', Corn and Peg have to find a fair way to make sure the citizens of Galloping Grove are all happy.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Friendship Day / Cowboy Canyon - After discovering that Carrier Pintock won't be able to see her sister on Friendship Day, the do-gooders set off on a journey to bring the siblings together! // Corn and Peg cross the wild west of Cowboy Canyon to find Clarissa's missing phone.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Diner Ducks / Switcheroo - After wracking up a huge bill at Pumpers, SwaySway and Buhdeuce level up into Diner Ducks to pay off their debt. // Things get awkward when the guys eat a loaf of Switcheroo Bread and swap bodies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep105
programme.desc: My Sharon-Ah - Brendar faces off against a Royal Order rival, but the result casts doubt about her ability to complete her ultimate quest.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Dorg's New Mom / Dorg Hates Olives - The gang need an adult escort to see the new Johnny Fist movie, so Yooki possesses Dorg's mom. // Dorg needs the Magicals' help to stomach his mom's icky Olive Surprise recipe. But instead, they accidentally turn the town into olive-loving zombies!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Smart Cookie / Disappearing Act - Yana eats a cookie to level up her smarts, but realizes it's her heart that makes her special. // Miguel learns a new trick, which gets him completely lost.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Unbarfable / Game On - Sanjay and Craig vow to make Hector barf for the first time ever. // The search is on when Sanjay and Craig's favorite video game goes AWOL.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Janitor Strikes Back / Dollar Day - Fanboy and Chum Chum have a new best friend made of gum. // Fanboy and Chum Chum can't wait to spend their only dollar on two delicious Frosty Freezy Freezes.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Top Dog / Quack in the Box - While Dudley bustingly takes over for a sick Chief, The fiendish League of Potential Perpetrators attempts to make their crime debut! // Quacky and the Sharing Moose are back to get revenge on Dudley for putting them in jail.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Rusty Marks The Spot / Rusty's Bits On The Fritz - When Rusty finds an old pirate's map, he and the gang dig up a lot more than treasure. // When the Bits wander into Rusty's parts replicator, the gang winds up with more bits than they bargained for.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem - When a magic flower shrinks Wally and Norville, they meet a tiny new friend named Wendy Whittle, who leads them on a quest to get big again.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Kraang Conspiracy - Feeling left out of the action, April insists on joining the Turtles on a mission to TCRI, where they learn a shocking secret about April's past.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep226
programme.desc: Chatterbox Gary / Don't Feed the Clowns - Gary has a pet translation collar, and he's talking up a storm. Everyone loves it... except for Squidward! // When a small clown gets left behind by the circus, SpongeBob takes the hapless harlequin under his wing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep7
programme.desc: Hall Monitor / Jellyfish Jam - Mrs. Puff's Boating School picks SpongeBob as this weeks Hall Monitor. // Over the repeated warning of his friends, SpongeBob takes a wild jellyfish home.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Allergic Reaction - While training for a TV baking competition with Eleanor, Theodore develops an allergy to an unknown ingredient.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Lice-enced to Teach - After a lice outbreak that closes the school, Dave sets up a classroom in the house acting as their teacher.

programme.desc: Merry Qweensmas/Silence Day/A Journey Through Night Land/And, Action!/The Unforgettable Trip - Part 2 - Today, Wonderland is celebrating “Qweensmas!” Well, more precisely, the Queen is the only one celebrating because, all the residents have to give her their stuff!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep202/Ep213/Ep221/Ep232/Ep244
programme.desc: Baby Hugo/The Show Must Go On/Warm And Fuzzy/Hugo The Entertainer/Knight Rider - Hugo doesn’t want to be a big kid anymore - there are too many responsibilities. So he decides he’s going to be a baby forever.

programme.desc: Taz in Toyland/The Sandman is Coming/New Cat in Town/Magic of Spring/Baby Gate - After Taz breaks all of his toys, Granny gives him one last chance to care for something.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep121/Ep122/Ep133/Ep129/Ep130
programme.desc: The Ballad Of Big Jon/One Good Turn/Pterodackattack!/Treasure Ranch/Good Neighbours - Prompted by a western hero, Jon wants to prove he's a real Ep.ic hero as well, but learns it’s the smaller, more everyday good deeds that really make him a hero to his family.

programme.desc: Tongue Twister/SleEp.ing Dogs/Skunked/Arlo And The Snake/Crack In The Tank/Flash And Boom/House Sitting/Findley Is Sick - When Bodhi’s tongue gets hurt it’s up to Doctor Lucas to help get her back to normal.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep31/Ep32
programme.desc: The Hodag Of Horror/Art Of Darkness - A traveling curio wagon arrives in Crystal Cove, and a carnie-barker by the name of Gene ShEp.herd unveils the Hodag, a beast supposed to be found in the wilds of Wisconsin.

programme.title: Mumfie Ep109/Ep110/Ep111/Ep128/Ep129/Ep130/Ep131/Ep132
programme.desc: Story Night/Firefly Day/Woodpecker's Companion/Silly Mumfie/We Must Decide/Incredible Jellybean/A Very Difficult Customer/Blackout - Boo Whale has decided to organise a late-night storytelling party. She advises everyone to take a midday nap but it is not easy to go to sleEp. when you are told to.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider Ep172/Ep162/Ep151/Ep142/Ep134/Ep124/Ep114/Ep103
programme.desc: Behind The Door/Farewell Sweet Ride/The Legend Of Big Butt/SleEp.ing Dogs/Flying The Nest/Lucas We Have A Problem/Home Sweet Home/Big Jumping Spider - Lucas finds a door at the base of Arlo’s tree – Who does it belong to?

programme.title: Roger Ep117/Ep118/Ep111/Ep112/Ep129/Ep122/Ep123/Ep124
programme.desc: The Visitors/The Cabin/Snow/The Lie/A Lovely Disintegrator/No Limits/Daddy's Vase/The Kite - Roger tends to rush to conclusions. After a misunderstanding, in order to make Fatou happy, our alien brings two retired tourists to Kooh-Los island. But just as quickly, he mistakes their intentions and decides they are a danger to the island. With Fatou’s help, he is going to elaborate a bunch of plans to get them to leave. And in the end, he understands that the couple, even though a bit invasive, are only full of the best intentions in the world.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.
